name: Strike a pose Icebreaker / Meme edition
description:
üçø NEW: Watch this quick walkthrough video!


This warm-up activity is funny and engaging to be used before any workshop or jam session.


Quick instructions on how to use this template:

  1. Ask your participants to choose a character that they like most
  2. Using the "Photo Both" widget ask them to strike the same pose to the camera
  3. Move the photo and the meme together to the main section
  4. When everyone is finished, ask them to vote on the best pose in the group
  5. Bonus! Reveal the questions flipping the meme cards and have extra fun with the participants


Happy jamming ‚úåÔ∏è
